Articles.Content: Let's all make stories based on ksp! Jebediah approved
But let's do in the sub-forum for fan fiction! (Moved. )

Once upon a time there was an ugly booster, he was so ugly everyone died.

The end

But then someone downloaded a mod that would allow the people of Kerbin to fight back. The brave hero Curseus searched the whole planet for the ugly booster, flying on his Sepratron powered shoes. He wielded nothing but a mere bazooka, and in his hand he held a photovoltaic panel that would allow him to target the ugly booster without having to look directly at it, for it could not kill anyone through its reflection.

Edited July 26, 2014 by Felsmak
He wandered far and wide, before ultimately concluding the ugly booster was no longer on the sweet face of Kerbin. His quest was to take him beyond the skies, to that final frontier: Space.

He travelled to jool...

Edited July 26, 2014 by Joshwoo69
tylo error :P
I think the OP meant for each of us to make our own stories, not one big one.
and then BillyBob shows up to crash the party ...

Never mind who CARES?

Fair enough

After billybob shows up everyone explodes. Because the mod was incapacitated with the current buns version of the kerbolar salad procrastinators.
